plot: Already having 6 daughters, the king is disappointed when yet another girl is born to his wife. The child is removed from the palace, but a minister close to the king takes the child and raises her as his own
title: Chil gongju
plot_es: Already having 6 daughters, the king is disappointed when yet another girl is born to his wife. The child is removed from the palace, but a minister close to the king takes the child and raises her as his own
plot_en: Already having 6 daughters, the king is disappointed when yet another girl is born to his wife. The child is removed from the palace, but a minister close to the king takes the child and raises her as his own
